pyevolcomp.benchmarks.ImgFuncs module¶

class pyevolcomp.benchmarks.ImgFuncs.ImgApprox(img_dim, reference, opt='min', img_name='', decoder=None)¶

Bases: ObjectiveFunc

objective(solution)¶

Implementation of the objective function.

random_solution()¶

Returns a random vector that represents one viable solution to our optimization problem.

repair_solution(solution)¶

Transforms an invalid vector into one that satisfies the restrictions of the problem.
